name: INListRideOptionsIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: No response didn’t specify a response code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You are ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to retrieve the list of ride options.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app to get information about the ride options.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchMustVerifyCredentials
items.desc: The user must launch your app and verify their credentials to continue.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchNoServiceInArea
items.desc: You do not provide service in the area requested by the user.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchPreviousRideNeedsCompletion
items.desc: You can’t book a new ride because an existing ride is currently in progress.

items.name: case failurePreviousRideNeedsFeedback
items.desc: You can’t book a new ride because an existing ride is currently in progress.
